Description: Florence, the sixth Tezos upgrade proposal, reached quorum during its promotion phase with 100% Yay / 0% Nay.
Florence, the sixth Tezos upgrade proposal, is in the Promotion Period of the Tezos governance process.
Florence, the sixth Tezos upgrade proposal, finished the Testing Period of the Tezos governance process.
Bender Labs launched the WRAP protocol - a decentralized Ethereum-Tezos bridge.
Umami Wallet Beta is officially online. Umami is a Tezos desktop wallet that combines best-in-class features to deliver a smooth user experience for both beginner and advanced users.
A closer look into some ongoing developments around DID within the Tezos ecosystem.
Official launch of TRUESY - a new NFT art platform and marketplace featuring fine art, iconic figures, unique brands, designers, elite athletes, musicians, and entertainers.
Ubisoft becomes a corporate baker on Tezos.
Learn more about the CleanNFT movement and eco-friendly platforms on Tezos attracting artists from around the world in this NYTimes article.
